#import necessary packages
import torch 
import random 

#create a list of random numbers
nums = [random.randint(1, 10) for x in range(10)]
print(nums)

#convert list to tensor
nums_tensor = torch.tensor(nums)
print(nums_tensor)

#calculate the mean of the tensor
mean_tensor = torch.mean(nums_tensor)
print(mean_tensor)
